text: As #COVID19 claims over 2.8 million lives globally, we take stock of the surge in cases, efficacy of #vaccination programs & the impact of #vaccine inequality. Max Lawson @Oxfam, US Epidemiologist @DrEricDing & Professor Polly Roy @LSHTM join @parikshitl on #GlobalEye at 7:30 pm https://t.co/BIIvmJyiaY
